Title: NIC.NET is an open-source .NET reusable components library
Description:
NIC.NET is an open source version of NewtonIdeas .NET reusable components library (written in C#). It includes:
- Spring-like IoC container (codename: Winter)
- lightweight DB-independent data access layer (codename: DALC)
- Virtual Filesystem layer (codename: VFS)
HomeWiki:
NIC.NET is an open source version of NewtonIdeas .NET reusable components library (written in C#). It includes:
  • Spring-like XML-configurable IoC container (NI.Ioc)
  • lightweight abstract DB-independent data access layer (NI.Data)
  • Abstract Virtual Filesystem API layer (NI.VFS)

supported targets
  • .NET 4.x, Mono

links
  • NIC.NET components source code on github
  • NReco Model-Driven Framework for ASP.NET (relies on NIC.NET components)
TagList: C#,Framework,Data Access Layer,File System,Inversion of Control,IoC,
